actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide that super-grade employees (and certain other Federal employees) whose pay is subject to a special statutory limitation shall be credited, for civil service retirement purposes, with the full amount of the basic pay they would be entitled to receive in the absence of such limitation.

summary.text: Provides that supergrade employees in the Federal civil service and specified other Federal employees whose pay is subject to a special statutory limitation shall be credited, for civil service retirement purposes, with the full amount of the basic pay they would be entitled to receive in the absence of such limitation. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8331)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5 of the United States Code to provide that super-grade employees (and certain other Federal employees) whose pay is subject to a special statutory limitation shall be credited, for civil service retirement purposes, with the full amount of the basic pay they would be entitled to receive in the absence of such limitation.
